snippet: The police continued to comb the woods in Harriman State Park for Eugene Palmer, who is suspected of shooting and killing his daughter-in-law last Monday.
abstract: Police continue to comb Harriman State Park in Rockland County, NY, for Eugene Palmer, who is suspected of shooting and killing his daughter-in-law in Haverstraw and fleeing to the woods; authorities have warned people to stay away from the park, which typically attracts crowds of city dwellers and foreign tourists admiring the turning leaves.
lead_paragraph: The police continued to comb the woods in Harriman State Park for Eugene Palmer, who is suspected of shooting and killing his daughter-in-law last Monday.

headline.seo: Search Continues for Eugene Palmer in Harriman State Park
headline.main: Signs of Suspect’s Presence, but He Remains at Large
headline.print_headline: Signs of Suspect’s Presence, But He Remains at Large
